cause.description:
Watering Malawi is a ministry of Passport, Inc. providing access to clean water, simple irrigation and sanitation systems in Malawi.
1. Watering Malawi advocates for long-term solutions to hunger through access to clean water and simple irrigation systems.
2. Access to water is a basic human right.
cause.mission: Provide Malawians with access to clean water projects.
cause.name: Watering Malawi
